triples.name: Satisfiability modulo theories
triples.relevance: SMT solving is the core technology that cvc5 implements and extends.

triples.name: cvc5
triples.relevance: cvc5 is the new SMT solver that this paper introduces and describes comprehensively.

triples.name: Automated theorem proving
triples.relevance: Automated theorem proving is the primary application domain for SMT solvers like cvc5.

triples.name: Boolean satisfiability problem
triples.relevance: SAT solving forms the foundation upon which SMT solving extends with theory reasoning.

triples.name: Z3 (theorem prover)
triples.relevance: Z3 is a competing SMT solver used for performance comparison in the paper's evaluation.

triples.name: Formal verification
triples.relevance: Formal verification is a key application domain where SMT solvers are applied.

triples.name: Automated reasoning
triples.relevance: Automated reasoning is the broader field of which SMT solving and CVC/cvc5 are key components.
